title: Drawing, "Design for a Cabinet, with Alternate Suggestions", ca. 1805
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and watercolor on paper
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: A cabinet on legs has an arched central bay surmounted by a coffer-shaped section with finials. The left side shows three shelves with railings. The right side is a half-round closed cabinet. Scale below.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Cabinet, with Alternate Suggestions", ca. 1805.
ca. 1805. Pen and black ink, brush and watercolor on paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-476.
